text: what you think about charity?
I think that it is good for people to donate to charity, especially one that will help children.
yes, do you think the money goes to the children?
I think it depends on the charity. I think there is sometimes charities that are not as transparent about where the donations go.
so some charities steal and some do the gods work?

I don't know that I would consider it stealing. I think that some charities use funds for things other than direct support. I think it is the donaters responsibility to research ahead of their donation
if they get couch what would be the sentence?
If they got caught stealing from a charity? or if they just don't use the funds correctly. I think it would be two different things
the firs question, If they got caught stealing from a charity?
If they got caught stealing from a charity they should go to jail. For how long depends on how much money they stole though
and if they dont manage the funds correctly ?
I don't think there should be a legal punishment for that. That would result in them losing their position
you think that the money managing and where the money go must be transparent?
Yes. If much of the donation goes to overhead costs, then people who are donating should be aware of that
did happen something recently about a charity fraud?
Not that I am aware of. I have not heard anything about that
what was the most amount collected in a charity?
The most amount ever? A lot - Paypal raised like 48 million online for charity a few years ago. But any long running charities that are successful probably far exceed that
last question, what is your impressions about save the children charity?
I think they are a good organization that does important work
